ai-patthana15.3:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.3:1.1_0: for the sake of indicating things don’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.3:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.3:2.1_0: for the sake of investigating only naturally does not give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.3:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.3:3.1_0: or cause or reason why neither give nor have caused the reason for the sake of specific condition.
ai-patthana15.3:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
